column1: Local Foods////I was looking forward to the crunchy chicken sandwich
column2: but was a little let down. The chicken was less flavorful than I thought it would be
column3: but I still thought it was a decent sandwich. The crunchiness came from their house chips placed into the sandwich
column5: not one that I really gravitated towards. I think I was expecting a more interesting chicken
column6: but it was very basic. It's not a bad sandwich by any means
column7: just not what I was expecting. I thought it would be a lot crunchier
column8: but by the time I got to tasting it
column9: the chips had sogged up a little bit.
